ygData.subject: EQ Money
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello All I am a 15th lvl High elf Paladin on Cazic-Thule, and I am located in the Faydwer area. My primary hunting grounds right now are the Aqua-Goblins (big
ygData.messageBody:
Hello All
I am a 15th lvl High elf Paladin on Cazic-Thule, and I am located in
the Faydwer area. My primary hunting grounds right now are the Aqua-Goblins
(big group only) and Unrest. The problem I am facing is even though I have
all the spells for 15th lvl and I have a majority of metal armor (some is
still leather) I can't seem to make any real money. I have noticed a great
need for a combine weapon but at my present rate it will take literally
forever. I tend to hunt in groups of 3 or 4 and generally for around 5 hours
a day. I guess what I would like to know is, Am I doing something wrong? or
is everyone broke at this lvl? Is there a better spot to hunt? Your
assistance is most appreciated.

Silvermyst
